title: Jacket
description: woven vertical stripe body in brown, black, purple, green and white with open sides and tape connection at under arm; two woven ties top; woven front and neck panels applied to body in unusual construction; embroidered large diamonds and goemetric designs in red, orange, turquoise, purple and white; black sleeves with applied striped borders which enclose horizontal colorful woven bands; on lower back edge, woven 6-1/2\" panel wtih black and white geometric design
